author: Nintendo of America
description:
STORY OF SEASONS: Grand Bazaar is out now on Nintendo Switch 2 and Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/story-of-seasons-grand-bazaar-nintendo-switch-2-edition-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1057-01&utm_id=P1057-01

Welcome to Zephyr Town, a sweet mountain village that needs your help to bring its famous market back to prominence. Take the leap and experience the new visuals, new characters, an expanded story, and fully voiced events today! 

#NintendoSwitch2 #NintendoSwitch #STORYOFSEASONS 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

title: STORY OF SEASONS: Grand Bazaar – Launch Trailer – Nintendo Switch 2

author: Nintendo of America
description:
The Kirby and the Forgotten Land – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition + Star-Crossed World game launches August 28, 2025, only on the Nintendo Switch 2 system. https://ninten.do/6000sZFFC

Join Kirby on a magical journey through the Forgotten Land with enhanced resolution and frame rates! Then uncover the mystery of the meteor with a brand-new story.

Nintendo Switch 2 players who already have the Kirby and the Forgotten Land game on the Nintendo Switch system can upgrade to Nintendo Switch 2 Edition + Star-Crossed World by purchasing the upgrade pack.
title: Kirby and the Forgotten Land – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition + Star-Crossed World – Launch Trailer

author: Nintendo of America
description:
